menu-items.name: Classic Burger
menu-items.description: Thick and juicy 1/2 pound angus beef char-grilled burger.

menu-items.name: Reaper Burger
menu-items.description: Our SPICY thick and juicy 1/2 pound char-grilled burger served on a toasted bun with your choice of sides. This burger is NOT for the faint of heart. Served with an 8oz glass milk

menu-items.name: Mission Burger
menu-items.description: Cream Co. Organic Beef Brisket and Chuck 1/2 Pound Buger served on a warm bun with your choice of toppings.

menu-items.name: Southern Comfort
menu-items.description: Eastern Carolina style pulled pork served on a warm bun. Slaw served on the side.

menu-items.name: Grilled Chicken Burger
menu-items.description: Tender char-grilled chicken breast seasoned to perfection served on a toasted bun with your choice of toppings.

menu-items.name: Buttermilk Fried Chicken Burger
menu-items.description: Chicken breast marninated overnight in buttermilk marinade, breaded with house seasonings, and fried until a juicy inside and crispy outside.

menu-items.name: SuperFree Burger (vg/v)
menu-items.description: Our Vegan Burger- A patty made with sweet potatoes, roasted mushrooms, walnuts, and seeds. Add your choice of toppings

menu-items.name: Classic Vegan Burger (vg/v)
menu-items.description: Seasoned Impossible burger.

menu-items.name: PERi-PERi Wedges
menu-items.description: Freshly cut roasted potato wedges tossed in fresh garlic and house peri peri sauce.

menu-items.name: Fries
menu-items.description: Freshly made boardwalk-style fries, cooked in pure, cholesterol-free, 100% peanut oil. Cut fresh and cooked twice. Firm on the outside and mashed potato on the inside.

menu-items.name: Cajun Fries
menu-items.description: Freshly made boardwalk-style fries, cooked in pure, cholesterol-free, 100% peanut oil, and then showered with a heavy dose of Cajun spice. Cut fresh and cooked twice. Firm on the outside and mashed potato on the inside.

menu-items.name: Poutine
menu-items.description: Our ode to Quebec-Freshly made boardwalk-style fries and cheese curds topped with house gravy.

menu-items.name: Onion Rings
menu-items.description: Our house beer-battered onion rings served with our signature house sauce.

menu-items.name: Garden Salad
menu-items.description: Our garden salad is made of crisp butter lettuce, leafy greens, sliced red onins, shredded carrots, cherry tomatoes, and croutons.

menu-items.name: Sweet Tea
menu-items.description: Southern Style Sweet Tea

menu-items.name: New Belgium Fat Tire Amber Ale
DrewDog Clockwork Tangerine Citrus Session IPA
Sierra Nevada Hazy Little Thing IPA
Lagunitas IPNA
menu-items.description: Non-Alchoholic

menu-items.name: K's Sweet-n-Spicy Sauce (vg/v)
menu-items.description: Chef K's Sweet-n-Spicy Sauce. Warning, this sauce is H-O-T!

menu-items.name: Chipotle Ranch
menu-items.description: Our chipoltle ranch dressng perfect for fries, onion rings, or on a burger!

menu-items.name: Horseradish Aioli
menu-items.description: Our medium-spiced horseradish ailoi (fancy for mayo) perfect for fries, onion rings, or on a burger!
